page.title: 12Life Style : Local Library
page.content:
I am member of Ealing Road library.I go to it nearly every 2 weeks.
In the Library there are rooms for different age groups,I'm a member of the junior group.
There are all kinds of books like, Science, Story, Dictionaries, Sport, Nature and Science Fiction.I'm most interested in Story and Nature books.
Before I go in the library I have to give my membership card and sign in my books. There is a code machine which reads the code inside the book and checks to see if it is overdue. Nobody can take out more than six books.
In the school holidays the library sometimes has exhibitions and special events for children.
